programme.title: Ready Jet Go! - EP 0071 & 0072
programme.desc: Ready Jet Go! follows two neighborhood kids: Sean, who has an all-consuming drive for science facts, and Sydney, who has a passion for science fiction and imagination. They both befriend the new kid on their street, Jet Propulsion, whose family members happen to be aliens! Together, they embark on great adventures, exploring the solar system, learning about space and science, but always back just in time for dinner!

programme.title: Teddies 2 - EP 17
programme.desc: While playing pretend as firefighters, Tizzy, Dom and Meeks realise that they need a leader to organise their firefighting team. Luckily, Firefighter Chief Sparky is there to lend a hand. Later, when Meeks tells his friends that he wants to learn how to fly, Tizzy volunteers to be his flying coach, Sparky sets up a runway, and Dom builds him a flying machine.

programme.title: 超人哪里找 Oh My Heroes! - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Nichol has noticed an increase in food prices along with excess wastage over these years. She established The Food Bank with the aim of being the prevailing centralized coordinating organization for all food donations in Singapore. Peter started his daily rounds at 3am, going around the neighbourhood combing through every garbage bins, meticulously sort out all the rubbish that can be recycled. He donated all the money from recycling as well as his salary from the day job to Tzu Chi Foundation. (重)食品批发是家族生意，玮婷和弟弟接手之后就发现到食品浪费的情况，逐年的增加，越来越严重。于是两人着手成立了食物银行，收集商家认为不合规格但仍然可以食用的材料，然后分发到不同的慈善机构。每天凌晨3点，Uncle Peter便会开始在附近的组屋活动，捡纸皮，翻找每一个垃圾箱，把可以再循环的有用物资筛选出来。他会很仔细的分门别类，确保充分的利用物品的每一个部分。他把所有循环物资卖掉的钱，连同自己打工的薪水，悉数捐给新加坡慈济作为慈善用途。.

programme.desc: (R) Gongsun Baoyue shoots Ma Chao with an arrow while he is fighting Zhao Zilong. Though seriously injured, Ma Chao forgives Baoyue for her rash act because he is in love with her. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)马超与子龙苦斗良久仍分不出高下，鲁莽的公孙宝月为了协助子龙，匆忙拉弓射出一箭，导致马超肩部中箭倒地。不过，事后马超并未怪罪宝月，因为他已爱上了她。.

programme.title: 双子星 The Ultimatum - EP 0011 & 0012
programme.desc: (R) Zheng Wen Yu was pregnant when she was taken advantage of by her boss Ye Song Nian, the CEO of Phoenix Corporation. Both Wen Yu and Song Nian's wife gave birth to daughters in the same hospital. As fate will have it, the hospital made a mistake and swapped the babies. Because Wen Yu's daughter was diagnosed with congenital heart disease, she kept silent about the mistake so that her daughter can receive the best medical care with Song Nian's wealth. (重)三十多年前，凤凰集团老板叶松年强暴了原已怀孕的郑文玉，满心怨恨的文玉遂故意让自己和对方二姨太同时出世的女儿－叶予晨、方宋乔身份对调。宋乔在文玉泄恨打骂之下，度过悲苦的童年；予晨长大后则在凤凰集团身居要职。.

programme.title: 真命小和尚 The Royal Monk - EP 0001 & 0002
programme.desc: (R) The story revolves around a lively eight-year-old monk named Happy. He started his life at Shaolin Temple, his wit and lively personality made him the abbot's favourite. His only desire is to reunite with his mother. (重).

programme.title: 玩家万岁 Home Makeover - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) In this hilarious and entertaining home renovation program, join Mark Lee, Kym Ng, and Ben Yeo as they aspire to give a makeover to homes, and bring joy to the homeowners' faces. (重)《玩家万岁》由李国煌、钟琴和杨志龙主持，每集到访不同的家庭，为他们重新打造理想的住家。过程中也会分享许多室内设计与装潢的贴士及好去处。.

programme.title: 星期二特写: 一座山一条河 Tuesday Report - A Hill and A River - EP 3
programme.desc: (R) Clarke Quay was the first landing place for many Teochew immigrants from China since the mid19th century. The area was also known as a regional trading and wholesale market for fresh ingredients. As time went by, numerous warehouses and bumboats moved upstream to Robertson Quay, crowding the river banks and leading to severe pollution. After a large scale clean-up in the 1970s, the river underwent a complete makeover. (重)19世纪中开始发展的克拉码头，不仅是潮州籍新客的落脚地，也是生鲜与南北货的贸易、批发集散中心。上游的罗拔申码头区域支流蜿蜒，遍布货仓与驳船修理厂，日久导致河流污染。1970年代集装箱货轮普及，加上清河运动，迫使驳船在1983年全面退出新加坡河。百多年转口贸易中枢的荣景不再，转型成为观光消闲胜地。节目访问1959年抵新的最后过番客、从事土产九八行的后代、见证驳船沉没的造船技师等人，诉说新加坡河从繁华走向衰落、继而重生的过程。.

(PG)(重)孝义发现启康祭拜一名叫赵子健的小孩，启康坦言子健是以前洞天和雅丽生的儿子，因患有智能障碍而被洞天送到孤儿院，继而在一场大火中丧生，栋梁才以此威胁洞天。孝义暗中调查，怀疑在特殊中心的智障儿文聪是洞天的亲生子。.

(PG)芝玲的尸体在招待所被发现，杨叔声称当晚他回到招待所时，只见到芝玲的尸体，并没有见到品睿、李昊和其他人。他担心豪森会因此陷入困难的境地，所以处理了尸体。警方因杨叔发现尸体却没有举报，加上没有不在场证据，有杀人嫌疑而将他扣留。.

programme.desc: (R) Tai Long, Owen and Hao Lun came to a small Nanyang eatery in a bid to earn the million-dollar Laksa recipe. Tai Long has a gift that allows him to see the different ingredients in each dish. He manages to see the secret of the Laksa and the lady boss, Yueniang, agrees to take him in. (PG)(重)三个年轻人即将得到老字号南洋风味小吃店价值一百万的Laksa祖传秘方。他们是风雨同舟的兄弟：商业奇才庄浩伦（包勋评饰）、刀神陈欧文（方伟杰饰）和烹饪天才何泰龙（冯伟衷饰），合称“H.O.T”。三个前科犯准备接管生意，创造更好的生活。他们将遇到为厨师梦而孤军奋战的曾美薇（雅慧饰）、扬言破坏他们声誉的大厨Gordon（George Young饰）和破坏弟弟泰龙幸福的泰虎（李腾饰）。H.O.T之间的忠诚和成功将会因为过去的阴影而再次接受挑战。.

programme.title: 线人2 Fixer 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Mindanao has always been a hotbed for terrorist activities in Philippines. Rebels use money as bait to recruit kids and train them to kill. The social turmoil, changes in family structure and poverty have resulted in kids being sold to the rebel groups by their families and were forced to join war. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)棉兰老岛一直是菲律宾恐怖主义活动的温床。叛军以金钱作为诱饵，招募孩童加以训练，无知的童年记忆，沉浸在杀戮中。社会动荡时刻，家庭结构发生变革、破裂，贫困，导致一票孩童被家人卖到组织里，迫于投身战事中。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 40
programme.desc: (R) Zhenshu promises Shuzi and Meici that she will leave Seoul and never appear before Xiuqing again. Yinghao, Meici and Shuzi thus allow Xiuqin to marry Xiantai. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)真淑向淑子和美慈承诺她会离开首尔，不会再出现在秀卿面前，请她们同意贤泰和秀卿的婚事。有了真淑的承诺，长辈们终于答应让秀卿嫁给贤泰。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 24
programme.desc: (R) Enzai bumps into Dong Wen's wife who shows symptoms of acute hepatic deficiency. However, she gets kicked out by the Hospital Chief Jin before Enzai could examine the patient. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)恩在遇到医疗船事务长的妻子出现事故要施手术的状况，恩在不忍心放下事务长的妻子，于是打算出手相救，可惜此时院长来到阻拦恩在，并命她立即离开。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 37
programme.desc: Taixiu faints from exhaustion after searching for Zhi-an endlessly and heads to the police station to enquire if there is any unclaimed corpse as soon as he regains consciousness. Daojing takes pity on Taixiu and reveals Zhi-an's whereabouts to him. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)太修终日寻找知安，终于不支晕倒，醒来后还立刻到警局向警方查询是否有找到无名尸。道京不忍心看着太修心急如焚的样子，终于向太修透露知安的下落。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 38
programme.desc: Mingxi cannot accepts Zhixiu's likes and preferences. The two quarrel and Zhixiu demands to move out. Zhi-an gives Daojing a big scolding when Daojing admits that he was the one who told Taixiu about Zhi-an's whereabouts. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)明熙始终不能接受知秀的喜好，两母女为此大吵一架，知秀生气地说要搬出去住。道京向知安承认自己将知安的下落告诉太修。知安对道京破口大骂，并要他从此消失在她眼前。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 5
programme.desc: In the mountainous area of Tuyen Quang province, Vietnam, is a tribal commune isolated from modernity and from loved ones who have gone to the cities in search of better lives. Emails and SMS-es are practically non-existent to the point where the tribes rely on a special postman to deliver items from loved ones. Host Daniel Hutchinson joins the postman in delivering personal packages to the families but not before embarking on an arduous journey to where the tribes are situated. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 5
programme.desc: The idea of exporting food is always met with the first and toughest hurdle: shelf-life extension. In this episode, Bjorn checks out the methods employed by two local food SMEs, The Soup Spoon and Tan Seng Kee to prolong the lifespan of their food products in order to expand globally. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 13
programme.desc: Hao Sen travels to Taiwan to meet Wei Yun but unexpectedly sees Eric instead. Hao Sen is surprised when Eric tells Hao Sen that Yan Feng had been monitoring his every move. Eric requests Hao Sen to sign an agreement to ensure that he can continue to work at Teng Sheng after he returns to Singapore. Hao Sen agrees and wants Eric to continue to help him decrypt the files. (PG)豪森应维芸之约，到台湾与她见面，没想到现身的却是Eric。Eric告诉豪森，延丰一直监视着他的一举一动，豪森感惊讶。Eric要求豪森签下协议书，保证自己返回新加坡之后，能继续在腾升工作。豪森答应，要Eric继续帮他解密档案。.

programme.title: 晚间新闻 News Tonight
programme.desc: A comprehensive half-hour news programme, NEWS TONIGHT provides viewers with important local, international and financial developments for the day. U频道《晚间新闻》，在半小时里除深入报道本地与国际要闻，还有详尽的财经新闻和体坛动态。世界局势与经济动脉，让大家轻松掌握。.

programme.title: 买卖 Business As Usual - EP 4
programme.desc: (R) In China, you can find any kind of "customised services" online, from running an errand for you, to proposing to your girlfriend on your behalf. These new services have improved consumers' quality of life and opened up a new market. How will these services impact our lives in the future? (重)中国电子商务从销售实际商品，到推出各种"客制化服务"，不管是跑腿代办，代人告白求分手，还是私厨登门煮饭。这些新兴服务提升客户的生活品质，并开创崭新的经济市场。这些服务将对你我未来的生活造成哪些冲击呢？.

programme.title: 探索食材 The Food Detectives 3 - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) The new season of "The Food Detectives" continues the culinary exploration of the foods we eat and more. Host Nikki Muller, will debunk the myths, delve into the unknowns and provide useful information to help us make informed choices for the meals we enjoy and how they fit into our lifestyles. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 寂寞鱼•听见 A Lonely Fish - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) Jing Xuan is a 3rd-year polytechnic student. At home, she always has to face argument between her parents. In school, she is being outcast by her classmates and nicknamed 'A Lonely Fish'. Jing Xuan best and only friend is Kora who is popular in school. One day, on her way to the classroom, Jing Xuan has a brief encounter with Yi Kai near the vending machine. When Jing Xuan is inside the toilet cubicle, she overheard Xiao Wei and Min Min's conversation and is upset to learn that Kora had been taken advantage of by them. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)蓝静萱是理工学院三年级的学生。在家，她经常听到父母的吵架声，在学校，她因为不合群而受到同学们的排斥。Kora是学校里的校花，也是静萱的唯一朋友。 这一天，静萱如往常上课，在学校的饮料贩卖机前与亦凯有了一面之缘。后来在厕所里，静萱听见小薇和敏敏之间的对话，得知Kora又被人家占便宜。.

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 41
programme.desc: (R) Yingxin finds the letter that Zhenshu left behind and discovers that Zhenshu has left home. Zhenshu writes in her letter that she wants to lead an independent life now that her dependents are all grown up. Xiuzhe consoles the upset Yingxin. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)英心看到真淑留下的信，发现真淑离家了。真淑没有说出离家的真正原因，而是说孩子大了，想过独立的生活。英心找玉顺帮忙，但还是找不到真淑。英心心急如焚，秀哲在旁安慰。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 25
programme.desc: (R) The Chairman of Doosung group requests that Chief Jin fire Enzai should he invest in the hospital. Chief Jin is torn between saving the hospital and undertaking the operation. Enzai finally gets his support. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)斗星会长向金院长要求辞去恩在，并接受斗星的投资，金院长十分为难。恩在坚决为了患者，为大家做手术，恩在幸得到金院长的支持，但医院却面临倒闭危机。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 39
programme.desc: (R) Zhixiu assumes that Yanghao is a warm elderly when he appears to welcome her wholeheartedly. Behind her back however, Yanghao instructs Zaicheng and Mingxi to send Zhixiu overseas immediately and to keep her identity a secret so as not to jeopardise the marriages arranged for Daojing and Shuxian. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)阳浩表现地非常欢迎知秀，令知秀错误地以为阳浩是个温暖的人，但阳浩却在私下命令载成和明熙立刻把知秀送出国留学，并将她的身份保密，以免影响道京和书贤的婚事。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 40
programme.desc: Suluo detects that Daojing has feelings for another woman. She wants Daojing to end everything with the other woman before he marries her. Daojing tries to deny any involvement with another woman, but fails. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)素萝察觉到道京心里有别的女人，要他把对另一个女人的感情处理掉才跟她结婚。道京尝试否认，但被素萝识破。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 5
programme.desc: The New People's Army in the Philippines is listed as a terrorist organisation by USA and Philippines and it has been estimated of claiming 30,000 lives during rebellion. In recent years, many members have abandoned their weapons. Does this act mean a loss of trust in justice or turning over a new leaf? (PG-部分画面令人不安)在菲律宾，有个叫NPA的新人民军的组织，被美国和菲律宾列为恐怖组织，据军方估计，该组织的叛乱已夺走三万人性命，近年有不少的组织成员弃械投降。 器械投诚到底是对正义之名失去信任，还是想重新开始呢？.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 14
programme.desc: Picaud impersonates as Brother Fa and sends an email to Eric, resulting in Eric's laptop to be attacked by a virus and causing all of the files to be locked. Eric logs into cloud storage and is relieved he has made a backup of Linda's file. Eric says that he will try to fix the virus in his laptop and lets Brother Fa to investigate on Picaud's whereabouts. (PG)Picaud假冒发哥的名字寄电邮给Eric，导致Eric的电脑中毒，所有档案都被锁住。Eric登入云端储存器，显示Linda的档案，幸好在云端做了备份。Eric表示自己会尝试解决电脑中毒问题，让发哥去调查Picaud的行踪。.

programme.title: 金装律师 Suits - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) Jinshi tries to find out from Duohan whether Jiang or Xian will be the final owner of the law firm. However, Duohan too has no idea who will emerge victorious eventually. Kangshuo knows Xian is back to take revenge on him for chasing Xian out of the law firm years ago. He is also aware that Yanyu is probably his only weakness. programme.title: 我也可以是韩星 Miss Korea - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) In the new season of Miss Korea, 2 young ladies from totally different cultures and background (one Chinese who lives in Australia & the other Singaporean) will leave the comfort of their homes and embark on a 3 months journey to fulfil a K-Pop dream in Korea.. (重)(最后一集)两个来自完全不同文化和生活背景的女生Julia和Jojo为了完成她们的韩星梦,远赴韩国进行3个月的造星训练。在人生地不熟的环境下,两个女生可否能和睦共处? 他们会实现梦想吗? 敬请期待!

programme.title: 我女婿的女人 Marrying My Daughter Twice - EP 42
programme.desc: (R) Meici goes to Zhenshu's house, packs Xiuqing's belongings and orders her to return home immediately. Zaiyong tells reporters that Zhenshu has left home because of family discord, prompting reporters to corner Xiantai at the office and demand for his side of the story. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)美慈不满秀卿住在真淑家，擅自到真淑家收拾秀卿的东西，并命令秀卿回家。载永爆料给记者，说真淑因为家庭失和而离家出走，导致记者们到公司，争相采访贤泰。.

programme.title: 医疗船 Hospital Ship - EP 26
programme.desc: (R) Moved by Guo Xian's tender care towards her baby, Yin Jing decides to drop the charges against Guo Xian and Enzai. She also exposes the scheme of Doosung groups to take over the hospital. The hospital ship resumes operation. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)茵景看到郭贤细心的照顾她的宝宝，决定公开撤销对恩在与郭贤的控诉，还揭穿斗星会长的阴谋, 医疗船最终得以重航。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 41
programme.desc: Daojing realises that he loves Zhi-an deeply when he almost gets involved in a traffic accident. Daojing returns home to tell his parents that he will not marry Suluo even if it means that he will lose his claim of the company. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)道京差点遇车祸，在危急的一刻意识到自己深爱着知安。道京立刻回家告诉父母他不要没有爱情的婚姻，所以不会跟素萝结婚。明熙提醒道京，一旦他不跟素萝结婚，他将失去继承人年的资格。道京一点都不在乎。.

programme.title: 黄金光辉的人生 My Golden Life - EP 42
programme.desc: Xianyu He encourages Xi to accept Nanjiu, but Xi refuses to do so. It turns out that Xi was abused by her ex-husband previously. Not only did she lose a baby, she may also not be able to conceive anymore. Xi does not want Nanjiu to lose the chance of having his own child. (PG)(双声道-中/韩)鲜于赫鼓励姐姐接受南九，但鲜于希不打算那么做。原来鲜于希当初被前夫家暴，不仅流产还可能永远不孕。鲜于希不想害南九没有自己的孩子。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 2 Hello Taiwan S2 - EP 10
programme.desc: This programme takes a look at some of Taiwan's famous eateries and dishes. Most importantly, the programme also reveals the moving story behind its success. 介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 你那边怎样.我这边OK - 台湾篇 All Is Well - Taiwan - EP 15
programme.desc: Dong Huang goes to the Criminal Bureau to find Eric but is unable to get any updates as there are orders to classify this information as confidential. Dong Huang finds the safe house according to the news and meets Dong Jie. Dong Jie recognises Dong Huang as the Singaporean who was previously wanted. Dong Huang asks Dong Jie about Eric's whereabouts but he decides to follow Brother Fa's orders to not disclose any information, despite him knowing how worried Dong Huang is. (PG)栋煌下山到刑事局找Eric，因Eric的消息被下令保密，令栋煌不得要领。栋煌根据新闻内容找到安全屋，遇到东杰，东杰认出他就是之前被通缉的新加坡人。栋煌向东杰打听Eric的下落，东杰虽知栋煌担心Eric，还是遵照发哥的吩咐，没有透露半句。.

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)鲜于赫鼓励姐姐接受南九，但鲜于希不打算那么做。原来鲜于希当初被前夫家暴，不仅流产还可能永远不孕。鲜于希不想害南九没有自己的孩子。.

programme.title: 最强大脑 第四季 The Brain China S4 - EP 10
programme.desc: (R) The Brain is a talent show that celebrates gifted minds and incredible skills of extraordinary men, women, and children. (重)《最强大脑》是一个大型科学类脑力真人秀节目。第四季主打“让科学在年轻人中流行起来”，以青春为科学站台，向年轻人传播科学的重要性，并请来年轻人喜欢的青春偶像参加挑战。.

programme.title: Wasabi 新体验 Find The Wasabi 2 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) "Find the Wasabi 2" is a 'reality-game travelogue' series featuring 3 Asian celebrities who are on a special mission to find the 'secret spice' of Japan... In each episode, the Hunters are challenged by a powerful "Commander" to solve 'mysteries' about Japan that puzzle people around the world. (重)WASABI新体验第二季再出击，徐鸣杰将与来自泰国及马来西亚的朋友在日本学习当忍者，通过不同的任务竞赛，探索不为人知的日本文化，带给你潮流、美食、旅游等第一手资料，发现日本新魅力！这一系列的Wasabi主持人是性感女神藤原纪香。.

programme.title: 北京到莫斯科 Beijing To Moscow - EP 12
programme.desc: (R) On An Ran's death anniversary, Kai Xiang meets up with Kloudiia. The two catch up while acknowledging the distance that now separated them as strangers. Kloudiia summons all her courage and tells Kai Xiang the true reason why she left without a farewell. The two embrace as they finally let go of all the pain and trauma. Kenneth can no longer keep up the facade, and confesses his feelings to Xiao Qi, who remains undecided between the two. (PG)(重)在安然忌日那天，凯翔一行人得以机会见到了Kloudiia。凯翔和Kloudiia就像熟悉又陌生的的朋友寒暄叙旧。Kloudiia鼓起勇气主动对凯翔说起当年分手，不告而别的原因，还有安然发生意外的真相，两人抱在一起，多年的心痛，在这一刻得到了解放和释然。。。另一边，筱琦对Kenneth坦白，自己早在五年前就和Kloudiia 面对面见过了，但是已对凯翔动心的筱琦却选择隐瞒实情。Kenneth也不再伪装，他对筱琦表白，这趟旅程已经走完。他希望筱琦可以跟他一起离开，筱琦陷入两难…….

programme.title: 生活达人 Life's Perfectionists Sr 9 - EP 2
programme.desc: (R) This programme introduces individuals who are outstanding in their respective fields of work. Find out how the featured individuals rose to the top of their leagues based on hard work and enthusiasm. (重)(双声道-中/韩)本节目为您找出在不同领域有杰出表现的达人。他们可能不起眼、也容易被我们忽略，但他们拥有的技能绝对是无人能及的。.

programme.title: 线人 3 Fixer 3 - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) The New People's Army in Philippines is listed as a terrorist organisation by USA and Philippines and it has been estimated of claiming 30,000 lives during rebellion. In recent years, many members have abandoned their weapons. Does this act mean a loss of trust in justice or turning over a new leaf? (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)在菲律宾，有个叫NPA的新人民军的组织，被美国和菲律宾列为恐怖组织，据军方估计，该组织的叛乱已夺走三万人性命，近年有不少的组织成员弃械投降。 器械投诚到底是对正义之名失去信任，还是想重新开始呢？.

programme.title: 美食攻略 Big Food - EP 11
programme.desc: (R) How is it possible for 60 people to make 60,000 muffins, 30,000 sandwiches and more than 10,000 cheesecakes in a month? That's a cheesecake every minute! Singapore's Foodgnostics supplies desserts, pies and sandwiches to several large cafes and restaurants using the most innovative baking technology. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Yuzhen realises that a hospital patient is Duohui's grandmother. He asks Haixiu to bring Duohui before her grandmother immediately, but Haixiu hesitates. Yuzhen and Haixiu quarrel over this matter. Yiyuan is displeased with Haixiu for raising her voice at Yuzhen and orders Haixiu to apologise to Yuzhen immediately. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)宇真发现一名急诊室的患者原来是多惠的奶奶，于是要海秀赶紧带多惠去看患者。海秀推辞，说有难言之隐。宇真觉得多惠抛弃了奶奶，于是跟海秀在医院里大声争吵。艺苑不满海秀大声跟宇真说话，要海秀向宇真道歉。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) Zhang Bai is sent to the hospital when he faints on the streets. He requests for the hospital to contact Wancai. Yuzhen bumps into Wancai at the hospital and finds out that Wancai has already resigned from the company. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)张白晕倒入院，要求医院通知万才去看他。万才到医院看张白，碰到宇真。宇真不明白万才为何会跟流浪汉成为朋友，万才终于向宇真承认自己已经辞职。.

programme.title: 危情三日 3 Days - EP 16
programme.desc: Ep 19The real traitor, Wen Chengmin, cuts off the President's contact with outside world with EMP bombs. Taiqing realises that the enemy is tapping their communication. He lies about the President's whereabouts and manages to lead the President away from danger.Ep 20The President manages to get Daochen to detonate the bomb on his own accord. Baoyuan gets promoted when the case of the terrorist attack finally comes to an end. She is happy when Taiqing confesses his feelings to her. Ep 19真正的内奸指挥长文成民利用EMP弹使总统与外界失联。警卫官们为了保护总统，在枪战中纷纷牺牲。泰庆知道敌方在窃听他们的通讯，为了让总统逃离危险，他谎报总统的位置，使总统得以脱身。Ep 20总统独自一人与道辰见面，然后用激将法让道辰亲手启动炸弹自尽。恐怖袭击事件终于了结，宝媛受到表彰升职。同时，泰庆的委婉告白让她心动不已。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 1
programme.desc: Without fail, Wen Xiuhao visits the old castle in Slovenia every Christmas to wait for a lady. Her luck turns good after wearing the jacket. 文秀浩每年圣诞都会到斯洛文尼亚等待一名女士出现。郑海拉一向事事不顺，她梦到小时候在雪伦裁缝店定做的大衣。一觉醒来,梦中的大衣出现在她面前，穿上后好运渐渐向她走近。.

programme.title: 最强大脑之燃烧吧大脑 第二季 Puzzle Masters Season 2 - EP 1
programme.desc: Hosted by Jiang Changjian, "Puzzle Masters Season 2" is a reality cum variety programme that showcases individuals with extraordinary brain power. programme.desc: Ep 21Caihan wakes up in the hospital and finds Xiuxian dozing off beside him. He feels awkward when he recalls Xiuxian confessing her love to him in the ambulance. programme.title: JML Home Shopping - Infomercial
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. 直播节目暂时无法观看。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 Sound Of My Dream S1 - EP 10
programme.desc: Sound Of My Dream is a music program which invites Chinese pop singers to challenge musicians and other singers to pit their skills. Mentors and singers put in their best to show the essence of music, regardless of the outcome. (重)《梦想的声音》（原《声音的战争》）是一档由浙江卫视所打造的音乐节目，邀请到华语乐坛歌手面对面进行“歌艺过招”，导师与素人歌手抛开所有包袱，毫无保留的相互讨教，竭尽所能展现出音乐本质。.

programme.title: 搜密新加坡 Secret Singapore - EP 10
programme.desc: Host Peifen investigates the rumour of an alligator in Geylang and finds the strangest of dollar notes - a Singapore dollar that few have a clue on. Can we use it for shopping? She also discovers a man who is rumoured to be able to flip a 300-kg tyre. (重)(双声道-中/英).

programme.title: 笔墨间的飨宴 A Literary Feast - EP 3
programme.desc: Shaoxing is literary great Lu Xun's birthplace. His works contain faithful records of the city's food culture, and reflect the customs of Shaoxing society. Host Youyi immerses herself into Lu Xun's book, and explores the cultural nuances behind the culinary delights. 绍兴，是许多文人雅士生长的地方，更是大文豪鲁迅的故乡。这一集，透过绍兴饮食，折射出鲁迅笔下的风土民情，社会底层小人物的心境。主持人有懿身历其境，走进鲁迅笔下的书中世界，了解潜藏在碗中的饮食密码。.

programme.title: 寻找原之味 Food Old Days - EP 6
programme.desc: Singapore is heralded as the Food Paradise and Singaporeans' favourite pastime includes searching out for the best hawker and local cuisines in every corner on the island. However, many traditional food fares are now on the brink of vanishing. Many of these stall owners are either old or retiring and found no one to succeed their businesses even though they may be thriving. (重)新加坡号称美食天堂，新加坡人最喜爱的休闲活动之一就是全岛搜寻最好吃的熟食档、到全岛各角落品尝本地美食。然而，随着时代进步、空间变迁，许多传统美食因为后继无人而渐渐消失，许多传统做法因为科技而渐渐失传。.

programme.title: 非一般递送 Special Delivery - EP 5
programme.desc: In the mountainous area of Tuyen Quang province, Vietnam, is a tribal commune isolated from modernity and from loved ones who have gone to the cities in search of better lives. Emails and SMS-es are practically non-existent to the point where the tribes rely on a special postman to deliver items from loved ones. Host Daniel Hutchinson joins the postman in delivering personal packages to the families but not before embarking on an arduous journey to where the tribes are situated. 六位主持人，各有不同的背景却身负同样的使命 – 递送非一般的物品给有需要的族群。他们的任务遍布亚洲偏僻各地，将考验他们的恒心、毅力与韧性。 秉持完成递送任务的坚定目标， 主持人将带领观众踏上一趟趟希望之旅，透过13集节目，让观众们感受《非一般的递送》送出的每一份快乐和感动。.

programme.title: 未来的食物工厂 Savouring the Future - EP 5
programme.desc: The idea of exporting food is always met with the first and toughest hurdle: shelf-life extension. In this episode, Bjorn checks out the methods employed by two local food SMEs, The Soup Spoon and Tan Seng Kee to prolong the lifespan of their food products in order to expand globally. 在《未来的食物工厂》，餐馆老板兼厨师沈观远将探讨新加坡中小型饮食企业运作和创新手法。 为了应对本地市场带来的挑战，中小型企业所采取的策略已超越自动化和研发新产品，迈向国际化的目标发展。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 17
programme.desc: Ep 17: Yiyuan's father looks down on Yuzhen. Yuzhen thus decides to take up Yiyuan's suggestion to work in a more renowned hospital. Yuzhen tells the family about Wancai's resignation. Xiuzi is enraged with Wancai for not being honest with her. Ep 17: 艺苑的父亲嫌弃宇真的家庭背景。宇真为了艺苑，想走后门到大医院工作。万才在公园做替身，搞到灰头土脸回家。宇真大声斥责万才，要他待在家里。秀子不明白为何宇真会那么生气。宇真终于跟秀子说万才已经退休了。秀子气万才瞒着她，大发雷霆。.

programme.title: 守护家族 (Dual Sound) Save The Family - EP 18
programme.desc: Ep 18: Haocai needs money urgently to tide over some financial difficulties and requests for Wancai to hand him his entire sum of pension. Wancai relents when Haocai threatens to end his life. Ep 18: 万才拿到退休金当天，浩才出现在银行门口，要万才把钱借给他。万才要把钱交给秀子，但浩才一下说要自杀，一下又说要让万才加入他的公司，万才动摇。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 2
programme.desc: Zheng Haila is assigned to meet a photographer in Slovenia and she mistook Xiuhao as the photographer and spent the whole day with him. 郑海拉被派到斯洛文尼亚迎接一名摄影师，她却把文秀浩当为摄影师，与他共度一整天。.

programme.title: 黑骑士 Black Knight - EP 3
programme.desc: Xiuhao buys over the house that Haila's auntie had bought, so Haila has to stay with Xiuhao. Meanwhile, Haila finds Sharon in one of her old photos and puzzles over why Sharon has not aged at all. 因为秀浩买下了姨妈卖的房子，没地方住的海拉得和秀浩住在一起。而海拉在旧相片里面发现雪伦，一点都没变老。.

programme.title: 梦想的声音 3 Sound Of My Dream S3 - EP 6
programme.desc: A music variety where a number of talented singers, amateur or otherwise are given the chance to "challenge" a celebrity tutor by singing one of the celebrity's songs. In exchange, the celebrity is assigned one of four randomly selected songs and has three hours to come up with a cover performance of this song. 与上季相同，基本模式为星素挑战，由追梦歌手对导师发起讨教（挑战）。但在第三季开始，选歌模式已经更换为第一季的模式，可是选择权是由参赛者说“开始”的时候，只要喊“停”，那一首歌曲就是讨教老师要唱的歌。和第一季不一样的是，每一首歌都有关键词。如果进行第二轮讨教，是没有任何的关键词。时间也从之前的6个小时改成3个小时。据华少声称，如果“惊”曲榜里的歌曲原唱者是导师的话，讨教歌手若是选择原唱者导师，将会带来的难度和风险更大，最终导致讨教失败。这一季的歌手包括林俊杰，王嘉尔，胡彦斌，张靓颖，谭维维 等。.

programme.title: 我的契约老公吴先生 My Contracted Husband, Mr Oh - EP 13
programme.desc: Shengzhu is very frightened when she finds a threatening note placed outside her car. Jingshu tries to console the frightened Shengzhu. programme.desc: Mel realizes that she is pregnant even when being on the pill. Firman begs his mum to allow Happy to stay in their home. Khalid suffers his first few loses but refuses to stop, betting even higher sums till he cannot use his credit card and has to borrow money.

programme.title: Kelas Kekek - EP 8
programme.desc: The last episode of Kelas Kekek focus on leadership. Look what happens to a group of people who attend a seminar led by over-zealous speakers in Pergi Seminar. And will the mat rock in Rock Neber Die finally get to perform at their very own gig? Accompanying these two sketches are other hilarious scenarios relating to the weekly theme.

programme.title: Girlfriend Aku Dari Neraka - EP 12
programme.desc: While out for lunch with Rudi and Mamat, Tasha accidentally bumps into her ex-boyfriend. This does not come well with Mamat as he begins to feel jealous about Tasha's past.

programme.title: Mencintaimu Mr Photographer - EP 8
programme.desc: An angry debate erupts between Aira and her father when he finds out that she is seeing Jemy, without his blessing. Full of anger, he wants Aira to leave Jemy and marry Nazrul immediately. This does not come well with Jemy and with no option left, he asks Aira to marry him.

programme.title: Jihan Show - EP 12
programme.desc: Jihan Show is a series featuring Malaysia's famous comedian, Jihan Muse. Featuring Amy Mastura, Zara Zya, Syuk and her weekly guest artistes, the Jihan Show promises to be full of fun and laughter as the group casually discuss on current issues and the battle of the sexes.

programme.title: Sweetie Nanie - EP 1
programme.desc: Fida and Nannie are good friends who study in the same University. Nannie tells Kak Jah about her encounter with Zafri, but nobody knows about her dark past. Manis playfully draws on Baizura's face with a lipstick and gets reprimanded.

programme.title: AH...! - EP 8
programme.desc: How important is love in our daily lives? In this final episode, we'll explore and learn the 5 signs of love to help both men and women achieve a healthier and better relationship with their loved one.

programme.title: Hero Seorang Cinderella - EP 16
programme.desc: Nura Medina lives with her stepmother, Datin Mawar and her stepsister, Puteri after her father, Datuk Azizan, remarries. Her relationship with her father becomes distant when her stepmother consistently directs her hatred towards her every day. Datin Mawar secretly conspires with Puteri to destroy Medina and get rid of her.

programme.title: Seribu Rindu - EP 11
programme.desc: Irfan reluctantly undergoes physiotherapy at Johari Medical Centre under Airel's care. Airel returns to his old self when he finds out that Maisarah went through a miscarriage. Dato' Muiz is shocked to see Damia and Johan together in public.

programme.title: O.M.G - EP 1
programme.desc: O.M.G is a light-hearted drama about three boys who swapped bodies after an experiment gone wrong. Soon, the boys will learn about their friend's race, culture and tradition. To top it all, the boys have been nominated to participate in a Racial Harmony competition. Will they get back their bodies and win the competition?

programme.title: Mancing Liar - EP 5
programme.desc: Mancing Liar is a documentary program about the fishing world, especially sport fishing.
